data.meanings: to rumble. rujz/rijz - pollution/filth, calamity, evil kind of punishment, wrath, impurity, plague, scourge, pestilence, abomination, idolatry, disease in the hinder part of camels, deed deserving punishment.
data.sentence: The word وَالرُّجْزَ comes from the root ر ج ز and is associated with the meanings: to rumble. rujz/rijz - pollution/filth, calamity, evil kind of punishment, wrath, impurity, plague, scourge, pestilence, abomination, idolatry, disease in the hinder part of camels, deed deserving punishment.

data.meanings: to leave/abandon/desert/forsake/depart/renounce/quit, separate oneself from, break with, abstain from, shun, leave with body or tongue or heart, leave lust and bad manners. hijr - bad manner, shameful action, nonsense talk.
data.sentence: The word فَاهْجُرْ comes from the root ه ج ر and is associated with the meanings: to leave/abandon/desert/forsake/depart/renounce/quit, separate oneself from, break with, abstain from, shun, leave with body or tongue or heart, leave lust and bad manners. hijr - bad manner, shameful action, nonsense talk.
